languages.text: Схватка с зловещим духом на замерзшей планете оставила болезненные шрамы. Даже исцелившись, плоть продолжает страдать от боли, словно ее терзает жестокий мороз.
The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.
languages.original_text: Схватка с зловещим духом на замерзшей планете оставила болезненные шрамы. Даже исцелившись, плоть продолжает страдать от боли, словно ее терзает жестокий мороз.

traits.locale_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.
The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.
The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.
The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

languages.text: 这些可怕的伤痕是在冰冻行星上与恶灵的战斗中留下的。即便伤口已经痊愈，受伤的位置也会不断作痛，仿佛被恶毒的冰霜紧紧攫住一般。
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: 这些可怕的伤痕是在冰冻行星上与恶灵的战斗中留下的。即便伤口已经痊愈，受伤的位置也会不断作痛，仿佛被恶毒的冰霜紧紧攫住一般。

languages.text: 凍った惑星で邪悪な魂と繰り広げた戦闘は、痛ましい傷を残した。治療をしても、傷ついた範囲は冷酷な霜につかまれているように傷み続ける。
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: 凍った惑星で邪悪な魂と繰り広げた戦闘は、痛ましい傷を残した。治療をしても、傷ついた範囲は冷酷な霜につかまれているように傷み続ける。

languages.text: El enfrentamiento contra el espíritu maligno del planeta helado dejó cicatrices muy dolorosas. Aun curada, la zona afectada sigue doliendo como si estuviera atenazada por una violenta escarcha.
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: El enfrentamiento contra el espíritu maligno del planeta helado dejó cicatrices muy dolorosas. Aun curada, la zona afectada sigue doliendo como si estuviera atenazada por una violenta escarcha.

languages.text: Le combat contre l'esprit malveillant sur la planète gelée a laissé de profondes cicatrices. Même guérie, la zone blessée irradie encore de douleur comme si elle était prise dans un étau de givre.
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: Le combat contre l'esprit malveillant sur la planète gelée a laissé de profondes cicatrices. Même guérie, la zone blessée irradie encore de douleur comme si elle était prise dans un étau de givre.

languages.text: Die Schlacht mit dem bösartigen Geist auf dem vereisten Planeten hat schmerzhafte Narben hinterlassen. Auch nach der Heilung schmerzt der verwundete Bereich, als wäre er von einem bösartigen Frost erfasst.
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: Die Schlacht mit dem bösartigen Geist auf dem vereisten Planeten hat schmerzhafte Narben hinterlassen. Auch nach der Heilung schmerzt der verwundete Bereich, als wäre er von einem bösartigen Frost erfasst.

languages.text: Donmuş gezegendeki kötü niyetli ruhla girilen savaş, ardında acılı yaralar bıraktı. İyileşmiş olsa bile yaralanan bölge, vahşi bir donun tesirindeymiş gibi acı vermeye devam ediyor.
languages.original_text: The battle with the malevolent spirit on the frozen planet left painful scars. Even healed, the injured area continues to ache as if gripped by a vicious frost.

traits.locale_text: Donmuş gezegendeki kötü niyetli ruhla girilen savaş, ardında acılı yaralar bıraktı. İyileşmiş olsa bile yaralanan bölge vahşi bir don tarafından ele geçirilmiş gibi acı vermeye devam ediyor.
